attributes.action: make it compulsory for all teenagers between the ages of 17 and 19 to complete a period of military service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All people between the ages of seventeen and nineteen to complete 6-8 months military service to meke them more disciplined, effective at work and to teach them some respect

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
